title: Identifying the statue
content: I'm looking to identify a statue, which is the bear leaning on a tree. This statue is called "El Oso y el Madroño," and it's a symbol of Madrid, found at Puerta del Sol. The bear leans on a madroño tree, which is also a symbol of the city. The background with buildings suggests this location, especially with the 'Tio Pepe' signage, indicating it’s in the Sol neighborhood of Madrid, Spain. So, definitely "El Oso y el Madroño"!

title: Location Conclusion
content: Plaza de la Puerta del Sol, Sol, Madrid, Spain, Europe.**Location Conclusion** Plaza de la Puerta del Sol, Sol neighborhood, Madrid, Spain, Europe
